scripts.dev-install: (cd api && npm install) & (cd app && npm install)
scripts.start-dev: (cp env/.env.dev api/.env && cp env/.env.dev app/.env) && concurrently 'cd api && npm run dev' 'cd app && npm run dev'
scripts.start-dev-api: cp env/.env.dev api/.env && (cd api && npm run dev)
scripts.start-dev-app: cp env/.env.dev app/.env && (cd app && npm run dev)
scripts.pub-test: npm run build-test && npm run start-test
scripts.prebuild-test: rm -r dist & cp env/.env.test api/.env & cp env/.env.test app/.env
scripts.build-test: ((cd app && npm run build) & (cd api && npm run build)) && npm run build-only
scripts.start-test: cp env/.env.test dist/.env && cd dist && npm run start
scripts.pub-stage: npm run build-stage && npm run install-stage && npm run restart-stage
scripts.prebuild-stage: rm -r dist & cp env/.env.stage api/.env & cp env/.env.stage app/.env
scripts.build-stage: ((cd app && npm run build) & (cd api && npm run build)) && npm run build-only
scripts.install-stage: if [ -d install-stage ]; then rm -Rf install-stage; fi && cp -r dist install-stage && cp env/.env.stage install-stage/.env
scripts.pub-prod: npm run build-prod && npm run install-prod && npm run restart-prod
scripts.prebuild-prod: rm -r dist & cp env/.env.prod api/.env & cp env/.env.prod app/.env
scripts.build-prod: ((cd app && npm run build) & (cd api && npm run build)) && npm run build-only
scripts.install-prod: if [ -d install-prod ]; then rm -Rf install-prod; fi && cp -r dist install-prod && cp env/.env.prod install-prod/.env
scripts.prebuild-only: cd build-helpers && npm run build && npm install
